location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 364: Captain Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Colonel Henry Creswicke Rawlinson CB, Political Agent in Turkish Arabia, Baghdad

mods.abstract: Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, transmits a copy of a despatch that he has addressed to William Taylour Thomson, Her Majesty's Charg√© d'Affaires at the Court of Persia, Tehran. The despatch concerns an excursion made by Sheikh Houssein from the river Euphrates to Bushire and the probability of his return under the support of the Turkish authorities. The despatch and its enclosures are not included with this letter.
